Desc: You are spotted!\nDefeat the enemies and move on.
Portal appeared\nEnter the portal to retreat from the battlefield
The stage will end soon!\nClear the stage before time's up!
Stealth!\nReach the target without being spotted!
Disarm the traps!\nDestory the traps and deactivate the laser beams!
Defeat the Boss without defeating Lee
Tap the control panel\nTap the control panel in order of the floor numbers
Defeat the Corrupted\nDefeat all the Corrupted
All the Corrupted have been defeated!
The Boss will constantly corrupt its targets
It seems something dangerous is impending...\nPerhaps it's better to leave
Something is coming...\nDon't stop, don't stop, don't stop!
A dark figure is charging towards you!\nPrepare for battle!
High-Level Corrupted ahead!\nDestroy nearby enemies first.
An arrow appears for each enemy you slew...\nWhat will happen if these arrows form a circle?
Protect the gate from the Corrupted!\nRemaining: 3/3
A Corrupted broke through the defensive line!\n<size=26>Remaining: 2/3</size>
A Corrupted broke through the defensive line!\n<size=26>Remaining: 1/3</size>
The Corrupted have broken though your defensive line!\n<size=26>Failed</size>
Defeat all the Corrupted!\n<size=26>Test the frame's power in combat.</size>
Novice Protection activated.\n<size=26>Commandant, please continue your battle.</size>
You can press the special button to quickly pass a stage and obtain all resources.
Collected 50 Cogs!\nCollect 50 more Cogs to clear the stage.
Collected 75 Cogs!\nCollect 25 more Cogs to clear the stage.
<size=50><color=#FF6600>ID Scan</color> GET!</size>\n<color=#33CCFF>[710277]</color> Displays character's current target enemy ID
<size=50><color=#FF6600>Total Damage</color> GET!</size>\n<color=#33CCFF>[710285]</color> Displays current DPS in seconds
<size=50><color=#FF6600>Speed of Panther</color> GET!</size>\n<color=#33CCFF>[710067]</color> Doubles the running speed
<size=50><color=#FF6600>Mega Blast</color> GET!</size>\n<color=#33CCFF>[700935]</color> Deals super damage to all enemies
<size=50><color=#FF6600>The World</color> GET!</size>\n<color=#33CCFF>[715795]</color> Pauses time for all units except for the caster
Attack the enemy using their weakness type
Attack the enemy using clones and summoned units
Attack the enemy using orbs of the same color as them
Removes shield upon QTE or entrance
Watch out for enemy's high-frequency attacks

Title: Initial Buff Instructions
Desc:
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 1]</color>710277
<color=#FF6600>ID Scan</color>: Displays character's current target enemy ID
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 2]</color>710285
<color=#FF6600>Total Damage</color>: Displays current DPS in seconds
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 3]</color>710355
<color=#FF6600>Solitude</color>: Solitude can be deleted directly
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 4]</color>710067
<color=#FF6600>Speed of Panther</color>: Doubles the running speed
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 5]</color>710359
<color=#FF6600>Strength of Bear</color>: Doubles the damage
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 6]</color>700935
<color=#FF6600>Mega Blast</color>: Deals super damage to all enemies
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 7]</color>700101
<color=#FF6600>Transcendence</color>: Restores all allies' HP
<color=#33CCFF>[Button 8]</color>715795
<color=#FF6600>The World</color>: Pauses time for all units except for the caster

<size=50>Martin's Toolbox</size>


<size=35>1. [ID Scan]: Displays the current target's enemy ID.
2. [DMG Stats]: Displays current DPS (damage per second).
3. [Solitude]: Character gains Invincible + Reserve HP + Remove Search + Remove Collision + Remove Barrier.
4. [Speed of Panther]: Character gains increased Move SPD.
5. [Strength of Bear]: Character gains unparalleled ATK.
6. [Earth Destroyer]: Unleashes an AOE explosion, dealing massive DMG.
7. [Transcendence]: Casts an AOE heal, restoring a large amount of HP.
8. [The World]: Casts an energy wave that can stop time.
9. [Summon Dummy]: Summon a dummy that doesn't attack players.</size>
Guards at the castle started to rally pursuers!\n<size=27>The pursuers will arrive in 30s!</size>
New pursuers have arrived at the field!
All guards are down! Rally of pursuers has stopped!\n<size=27>Eliminate the remaining pursuers and leave the castle.</size>
All guards are down! Rally of pursuers has stopped!\n<size=27>Leave the castle</size>
All the castle units are out!
Eliminate enemies in all zones!\n<size=27>Enemies will get stronger as you progress.</size>
<color=#FF3300><size=40>The temperature keeps dropping. The loss of body temperature has accelerated!</size>\n<size=27>Movement Speed and Dodge Gauge Recovery -20%</size></color>
<color=#FF3300><size=40>Insufficient firing energy left. Please switch to a melee weapon!</size></color>
Farmer Bob and his harvest field appear on the battlefield!
Bob rushes to you after tilling the field!
<size=50><color=#7FFF00>Imprisonment has disappeared. Collect Orbs!</color></size>\nCollect Orbs of the <color=#38bbff>same color</color> to earn <color=#38bbff>more points</color>.
Time is up! Orbs are imprisoned! Score: {0}
You collect all the Orbs and earned {0} points!
Failed to activate!\n<size=30>Hurry back to the spotlights!</size>
Convert <color=#FF3300>[Crimson Lamp]</color>\n<size=30>Fight under the spotlight to deal more damage.</size>
Convert the <color=#0099FF>[Brilliant Light]</color>\n<size=30> and fight under the spotlight to increase RES and gain Super Armor</size>
Convert the <color=#FFFF33>[Recovery Light]</color>\n<size=30> and fight under the spotlight for Regen</size>

and plastic airbags for equipment packaging.
Round coffee cups, square writing boards.
Are you going to send her back to the land through the cargo channel?
Is there any way to make her stand up?
It's impossible for her to survive such an intensive surgery.
Every surgery has its risks. Not to mention she's only a kid.
Why the sudden obsession with medical science? Are you concerned about this child?
This is a field I've never tapped into before... It's my... personal interest.

Calibration for the rifts of all logs has been completed.
Who allows you to come over here?
That's why that kid is always...
That day, the sirens went off. The piercing alarms overwhelmed Atlantis.
You're... the girl raised by the medical department? Didn't they teach you the rules?
Of course they did. Those rules are...
Colder than seawater, harder than icebergs.
Calorie intake is limited to 1,164 kcals per day. These are your rations for today.
Children are treated as adults without any special privileges.
The book says that people will die from hunger if they have nothing to eat.
When many people die from hunger at once, it's called a famine.
Am I going to die from hunger?
The book also says the world outside Atlantis is much bigger.
The sea has its end, which people call land.
Compared with land, Atlantis is only a grain of dust.
There are many, many Atlantis on land with many, many people living inside.
Unlike Atlantis, they don't have stacks of rules on land.
Over there, a warm hug and comfort will be given to every weeping child.

You want to live, don't you?
Then become [valuable] to us. This is Atlantis' rule. We have no room for anything useless.
The medical department was swamped with people.
She glanced at the operating table with an apathetic face.
A word of reminder. The pain will be insufferable. There's no way to go back once you've started.
When I woke up again, I finally realized it wasn't a dream at all.
My brain was recovering from anesthesia.
That was our first try. You couldn't ask for more.
Stop dawdling. Come here, we have to make you adapt to your body right away.
My chest tightened, as if something was trying to crush my heart.
Lamia's body has finally adapted to the hypergravity effect caused by the intense water pressure and settled down.
400 times the atmospheric pressure—equivalent to the pressure at a depth of around 4 km in the ocean.
It took some time, but she is already used to this new body.

Title: Alpha's Challenge to the Commandant:
Desc:
All these years have passed, and both our powers have reached new heights. Still, don't you sometimes miss that pure clash of steel, the dancing shadows of blades, the thrill of fighting with our backs against the wall?
Come then, defeat me once more. Prove your strength as Chief, and show me how much you've grown over these years.

                                          The strong

                                            need no gifts

                                       but only skill

                                       to prove themselves.
You may select another Active Skill for Levvi. Switching to [Lightning Leap] now.
Next up is the tutorial of Levvi's joint attack
Next, let's learn about the <color=#ffda58>second process</color> during Dream Dive.

Title: Dear Commandant,
Desc:
Babylonia has been operating "smoothly" in your company.

I bet there must be unforgettable memories on this rocky path. To celebrate them, I picked some signature battles and documented them in this Smart Tactical Analysis Compilation... Hope it can remind you and your Constructs of the days you spent together in the past 5 years. It will also generate new battles based on the existing data, even the ones you've never seen.

Anyway, let's continue this journey together!

Title: Private Journal: 603202
Desc:
If we could abandon those naive ideas and take another look at the previous experiments from a broader viewpoint, these are failures through and through without a doubt.

I was working in the wrong direction right from the beginning. Thankfully, I still have time. The M.I.N.D. is a deep subject. I will come up with a satisfactory answer one day.

<size=25>All energy is consumed while casting Signature, and DMG increased by <color=#7FFF00>50%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>100%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>150%</color> when extra consumption exceeds <color=#7FFF00>30</color>/<color=#7FFF00>60</color>/<color=#7FFF00>90</color> points (Be valid only for DMG-based Signature) </size>

<size=25>Attacks by Attacker Omniframes will mark the target for <color=#7FFF00>10s</color>, and the DMG of the marked target dealt by Support-type Omniframes will increase by <color=#7FFF00>80%</color></size>

<size=25>Attacks by Attacker Omniframes will mark the target for <color=#7FFF00>10s</color>, and the DMG of the marked target dealt by Tank-type Omniframes will increase by <color=#7FFF00>50%</color></size>

<size=23>When a non-Attacker Omniframe pings <color=#7FFF00>6</color>/<color=#7FFF00>9</color>/<color=#7FFF00>12</color> Orbs, the next member entering the game will gain<color=#7FFF00>15%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>30%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>50%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for<color=#7FFF00>5</color>/<color=#7FFF00>8</color>/<color=#7FFF00>10</color>s</size>

<size=23>When a non-Attacker Omniframe deals <color=#7FFF00>50k</color>/<color=#7FFF00>80k</color>/<color=#7FFF00>100k</color> DMG, the next member entering the game will gain<color=#7FFF00>15%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>30%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>50%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for<color=#7FFF00>5</color>/<color=#7FFF00>8</color>/<color=#7FFF00>10</color>s</size>

<size=25>Reduce Orb recovery rate by <color=#ff0000>50%</color>. Grant the next member entering battle <color=#7FFF00>3</color>/<color=#7FFF00>6</color>/<color=#7FFF00>9</color> extra Orbs when the current member deals <color=#7FFF00>80k</color>/<color=#7FFF00>120k</color>/<color=#7FFF00>180k</color> damage.</size>

<size=25>Reduce Orb recovery rate by <color=#ff0000>50%</color>. Grant team members <color=#7FFF00>3</color>/<color=#7FFF00>6</color>/<color=#7FFF00>9</color> extra Orbs when the current member is healed by over <color=#7FFF00>2000</color>/<color=#7FFF00>2700</color>/<color=#7FFF00>4200</color> HP in one go.</size>

<size=25>Reduce Orb recovery rate by <color=#ff0000>50%</color>. Grant team members <color=#7FFF00>3</color>/<color=#7FFF00>6</color>/<color=#7FFF00>9</color> extra Orbs when the current member gains over <color=#7FFF00>700</color>/<color=#7FFF00>900</color>/<color=#7FFF00>1200</color> Shield.</size>
<size=25>When CUB is present, current members will be added <color=#7FFF00>3</color> Signal Orbs every <color=#7FFF00>10 s</color></size>

<size=25>Reduce Orb recovery rate by <color=#ff0000>50%</color>. Hitting with Basic ATK deals Extra DMG <color=#7FFF00>1</color> time equal to <color=#7FFF00>100%</color> of the original damage.</size>
<size=25>When CUB's skill is used, Extra DMG bonus of current members will increase by <color=#7FFF00>30%</color> in <color=#7FFF00>5s</color></size>

<size=23>Character switch CD increases <color=#ff0000>10S</color>, and current members will gain <color=#7FFF00>25%</color> Extra DMG bonus and <color=#7FFF00>10%</color> Extra DMG reduction if they are on the field for <color=#7FFF00>10S</color>, up to <color=#7FFF00>4</color> layers, which will be emptied in case of switch</size>
<size=25>While Switch CD decreases <color=#7FFF00>5S</color>, QTE CD will increase <color=#ff0000>4S</color></size>
<size=25>Reduce Orb recovery rate by <color=#ff0000>50%</color>, but reduce QTE CD by <color=#7FFF00>3S</color> and the current member recovers <color=#7FFF00>3</color> Orbs.</size>
Offset force field in effect, DMG dealt on Members in battle <color=#7FFF00>greatly reduced</color>
Offset force field partially invalid, DMG dealt on Members in battle <color=#ff0000>increased</color>
Offset force field fully invalid, DMG dealt on Members in battle <color=#ff0000>greatly increased</color>
<size=25>After a 3-Ping, <color=#ff0000>1</color> Signal Orb of the same color will drop on the field. <color=#ff0000>3</color>s cooldown.</size>

<size=25>All non-Attacker Omniframes store <color=#ff0000>1</color> Signal Orb upon a 3-Ping. Up to <color=#ff0000>6</color> Orbs can be stored. Their color depends on the Orbs you ping the last time. The Attacker Omniframes will obtain all the stored Orbs when entering the field.</size>

<size=25>When a member spends more than <color=#ff0000>5</color>/<color=#ff0000>10</color>/<color=#ff0000>15</color>s on the field, switching members will create <color=#ff0000>1</color>/<color=#ff0000>2</color>/<color=#ff0000>3</color> light spheres that revolve around the member switched in and deal damage to enemies in contact with them for <color=#ff0000>6</color>s.</size>
<size=25>When switching members, reserve members will gain <color=#ff0000>3</color> Signal Orbs of the same color. QTE cooldown increases by <color=#ff0000>4</color>s</size>.
<size=25>When switching members, reset QTE cooldown for all.</size>

<size=25>Every 20s, sets an enemy's <color=#7FFF00>left/right/back</color> side as a weak point. DMG dealt to that weak point will increase by <color=#7FFF00>50%</color> for <color=#7FFF00>10</color>s.</size>

<size=23>Extends Stun duration inflicted by 3-Ping to <color=#7FFF00>5</color>s, during which <color=#7FFF00>25%</color> of the DMG dealt to the stunned enemy will be accumulated. After you switch the member and land an attack (except for QTE), the accumulated DMG will be dealt to the target and reset.</size>

<size=23>When receiving a lethal DMG, removes a "Persist" mark to <color=#7FFF00>negate the lethal DMG</color>. When the mark exists, gains a DMG bonus based on current HP (<color=#7FFF00>18%</color> up at <color=#7FFF00>100%</color> HP).</size>
<size=25>Deployed members gain an Extra DMG bonus based on current HP (<color=#7FFF00>26%</color> up at <color=#7FFF00>100%</color> HP).</size>

<size=25>Deployed members gain a <color=#7FFF00>30%</color> Extra DMG bonus and lose HP per second. The longer they are on the field, the <color=#ff0000>more</color> HP they will lose per second. Switching members will reset this effect.</size>

<size=25>Deployed members gain a <color=#7FFF00>2%</color> Extra DMG and DMG Reduction bonus for every <color=#7FFF00>0.2s</color> they stand still. Stacks up to <color=#7FFF00>15</color> times. Moving will reset all stacks.</size>

<size=25>Gains an <color=#7FFF00>8%/18%/25%</color> Extra DMG bonus for <color=#7FFF00>8</color>s when moving more than <color=#7FFF00>10/15/20</color>m. Cannot be stacked. Switching members will reset the effect.</size>

<size=23>When at <color=#7FFF00>medium range</color> from the linked target, gains DMG Reduction while the target becomes Vulnerable. When at <color=#ff0000>long or close range</color>, becomes Vulnerable while the target gains DMG Reduction. The percentage varies from <color=#7FFF00>+25%</color> to <color=#ff0000>-20%</color>.</size>
<size=25><color=#7FFF00>35%</color> of the total DMG dealt in Matrix will be inflicted on the target When Matrix ends.</size>

<size=23>Pinging Signal Orbs in Matrix grants <color=#7FFF00>(number of Signal Orbs x 2)%</color> (up to <color=#7FFF00>24%</color>) Extra DMG bonus to the whole team for <color=#7FFF00>5</color>s.</size>

<size=23>Switching members will detonate the "Frozen" ailment, dealing Elemental DMG equal to <color=#7FFF00>700%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>850%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>1100%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>1400%</color>/<color=#7FFF00>1800%</color> of the switched member's ATK based on stacks detonated.</size>
<size=25>Each successful dodge grants a permanent <color=#7FFF00>8%</color> Extra DMG bonus. Stacks up to <color=#7FFF00>3</color> times. All stacks reset when being hit.</size>
<size=25>Each dodge grants an <color=#7FFF00>18%</color> Extra DMG bonus for <color=#7FFF00>5</color>s. Cannot be stacked. Duration will reset every time it is triggered.</size>

<size=25>Switching members will fully restore the Dodge Gauge and grant an Extra DMG bonus of up to <color=#7FFF00>25%</color> based on the Dodge Gauge percentage for <color=#7FFF00>10</color>s.</size>

<size=25>Gains a bonus by reaching a certain combo count:
50: Deals 500% area DMG.
75: Gains 30 Energy.
100: All members gain 3 Signal Orbs of the same color.
150: Gains "Immovable".
200: Increases DMG by 50% for 8s.
Switching members will reset the combo count.</size>

Title: A Rope
Desc: A red and gray braided rope, probably worn by someone around their wrist. It lies on a trace that is about to dry out, wrapped up by a weird dried liquid. If you take a closer look, you'll find that the trace seems to lead to somewhere in the distance...

Title: Claw Marks and Rubbles
Desc: The erosion doesn't seem to be caused by Hetero-Creature but by physical destruction. Probably caused by the recent combat.

Title: Nameless Letter 2
Desc:
The Ascendant gave me some paper to write down things I wanted to remember. So I copied my terminal diaries here.
December 7 Sunny
This is ridiculous. Today I caught several defectors who claimed that the recalling thing was a lie. How could it be? I don't believe Babylonia would send us to dangerous battlefields without a backup plan. But they insisted, making it sound so real. I got pissed and pulled out my gun to shoot him in the leg right there. Defecting just because of some inflammatory speech. Risking their lives. For what? Have they lost their mind?
December 29
I asked boss about the recalling. So now I'm in Cthylla's cradle.
It's ridiculous, right?

Title: Nameless Letter 4
Desc:
Gradually, Jane's authority was undermined, and they eventually changed the access level of her card. Whenever she approached the CPF, others would dismiss her, saying either, "Leave it to us, Jane!" or "We are professionals! Just leave it, Jane!"
I suggested she leave the place, but she said she was old and could get precise things wrong, which would make it harder for her to find another technician job, so it's better to stick with technique management. Moreover, that conservation area was her home.
In an effort to gain acceptance from the team that treated her as an outsider, Jane discovered that the leader coveted an antique painting from the Golden Age, and that she could use it to her advantage.
...I'm still unsure how she managed to get her hands on that painting. The last time we met, she had lost four teeth, yet she cheerfully told me that the painting had been given away. The boss was going to refuse but eventually took it upon feeling her sincerity.
I've never seen her after that, except to learn of her tragic fate. On the morning the rebuilding of the conservation area was completed, she jumped from the roof.
When I rushed there, her blood was already gone, covered by the red carpet where the host stood during the rebuilding celebration.
...
I couldn't understand what exactly happened to her as she couldn't understand why her friend was found dead ten miles away, but now I get it.
That's why I'm here.

Title: Nameless Letter 3
Desc:
I have nothing to put on the paper, so I'll just write about my friend Jane.
She worked as a maintenance technician for Central Purification Filters. After her persistent efforts, her request for supplies and a rebuilding team was finally approved on her 44th birthday by Babylonia. This allowed her and her friend to return to the conservation area where she used to live.
That wasn't an ideal place to live in, particularly for the elderly and vulnerable, but she was determined to rebuild it.
She believed that the aftermath of the Pulia Forest Park disaster still lingered and felt a personal responsibility to contribute, especially considering it was where her husband had lost his life while protecting her when the calamity erupted.
Following that, we didn't communicate for about six months. When I heard from her again, it was about the untimely death of her friend, under mysterious circumstances. He vanished while sitting in the CPF, only to be found ten miles away, with half of his body devoured by Hetero-Creatures.
Jane always said it was no accident. According to her, someone coveted the rebuilding project and sought to take control after realizing it wasn't as perilous as rumored. She and her friend had rejected them, and shortly after, the unfortunate incident occurred.
As the task of managing the entire rebuilding team became overwhelming, Jane eventually still agreed to collaborate with others. However, a person aware of the inner workings, a remnant of the past like her, was nothing but an eyesore to them.
They would sneer at her, questioning how her friend could have died if she had been diligently watching over the CPF. They would mockingly remark that if she had agreed earlier and with more people involved, his death could have been avoided.
(It seems there's a second page of this letter...)

Title: Nameless Letter 1
Desc:
The long-haired Ascendant gave us some paper to write down things we want to remember because we might lose some memories after being reborn by Mother.
It was nice of him, but since I'm taking the submarine back tomorrow, there's nothing I really want to leave behind. I'll just write about what has happened these days for those to come.
My friend has already been given birth to by "Mother" and become one of the "Sea Fairies". He still remembers me and even all the details from our childhood.
But, well... I feel like he's changed. He used to be humble and timid, but now he's unbearably arrogant, like someone who has just hit a jackpot.
I asked him what happened, and he said he now understands things he couldn't before and is no longer afraid of the unknown or his own powerlessness. Isn't that just being arrogant? It annoyed me just looking at him, so I told the Ascendant that I wanted to quit and go back. I didn't expect him to agree, but he did anyway and even arranged a submarine for me. I thought a cult-leader guy like him wouldn't let anyone leave easily, but he said it was unnecessary. Ha, I get him—it's not like the world will end without me.
I don't have much else to share since I slept on the way. Everything just doesn't feel real. Even if I tell other people, they'll think I'm crazy... especially when I talk about "Mother"... I always dream of her during my sleep here... It feels like I can forget about all the bad things by just looking at her.
I'll miss her.

Darkness floods into the pupils, contaminating the boundaries of vision.
Faith begins crumbling as the boundaries of reality are not as sharp as before...
The tide will pounce on its quarry.
The tide will tear its offering apart.
Twisted billows have constricted the body.
Twisted thunderbolts are gnawing the shell.
Turning away from the light of will, you embrace the branch of the abyss.
You dive into the tide, taking in all its power.
At the cost of being torn apart, you expose yourself to the storm for a glimpse into the mysteries of twisted nature.
Once again, reality falls into illusion.
When they are finally gone, the world returns to the edge of reality.
The bonfire has lured the moths into dancing with its flame fueled by crisis and glory.
<color=#ff0000>As the wall of will crumbles, the enemies are becoming more ferocious.</color>

The Purifying Force has joined the battle.\n<size=25>Their statuses are displayed on the left side of the screen. Tap Jha's portrait to select the Purifying Force's tactics.</size>

Title: Barque Model
Desc:
A complex, delicate handicraft barque ornament.

The creator must have put great effort into processing 

the materials to avoid their work from rotting away 

completely over time.

Title: Phonograph
Desc:
Its hand-crank can still be turned, but no response 

will come out of it.

It must've broken.
Enter the living room of the orphanage
Investigate the living room and find the security room

Title: Broken Construct
Desc:
The Construct is already broken and doesn't appear to 

pose any threat.

Based on the identification of the terminal, 

its modification surgery was done at around the age of 

ten.

Although its frame is of a very old version, the Construct 

looks completely different from the image the terminal 

displayed,which indicates illegal modification.

Title: Orphanage Bunk Bed
Desc:
Most bunk beds are neat and tidy.

Perhaps the children here have been living a relatively 

easy life?

Title: Rocking Horse
Desc: The horse can still be used despite the subtle \n\nscratches on it.

Title: Big Teddy Bear
Desc: There is a broken surveillance device in the belly of \n\nthe bear.

Title: Clock
Desc:
The pendulum seems to be stuck, but the hands

are still movable.

On the side of the pendulum clock is a schedule.



————————Schedule————————

07:00-07:30 Get up

07:30-12:00 ▇▇▇▇

12:00-14:00 Afternoon ▇▇

14:00-16:00 Group Games

16:00-22:00 ▇▇▇▇

22:00-07:00 Night Rest



There is another schedule under it.

Removing the one on top will ruin it. Just keep 

it as it is.
Wait for Vera to finish investigating the shelf

Find and adjust things that affect memory                                                           <size=25><color=#CCCCCC>Switch to</color> <color=#0099FF>Bambinata</color> and <color=#CCCCCC>enter</color> the <color=#0099FF>Memory POV</color></size>

Fix the broken memory data                        <size=25><color=#CCCCCC>Switch to</color> <color=#FF0000>Vera</color> and <color=#CCCCCC>return to</color> the <color=#FF0000>Reality POV</color></size>
Adjust the time of the clock

Title: Marks on the Floor
Desc: Judging from the four square marks on the carpet,\n\nsomething must be placed here for a long time.

Title: Square Stool
Desc: A common four-legged stool knocked over by someone
Load data with the external memory module

Investigate in the recovery space              <size=25><color=#CCCCCC>No. </color><color=#0099FF>312</color> <color=#CCCCCC>data</color> or <color=#CCCCCC>No. </color><color=#FF0000>237</color> <color=#CCCCCC>data</color></size>
▇▇ perspective currently read by ▇ ▇▇ doesn't match ▇▇
Go to the "security room" in the recovery space            <size=25><color=#CCCCCC>Data No. </color><color=#0099FF>312</color></size>
Find and fix the data deviation in the area              <size=25><color=#CCCCCC>Data No. </color><color=#0099FF>312</color></size>
Check what's happening back in the living room

Title: Text on the Bottom
Desc:
To ▇▇,

My dear friend, your kindness has made us proud. We 

wish you and the kids here

all the best.



But life isn't always smooth. It's okay to be lost

at some time. Just remember: <color=#FF0000>Being on the sea, 

sail. Being on the land, settle.</color>

<color=#FF0000>And the rainbow will always come out after the rain.</color>



Your friend, ▇▇▇

Title: Text on the Bottom
Desc: Being on the sea, sail. Being on the land, settle. \n\nAnd the rainbow will always come out after the rain.

Title: Azure Dragon Scroll
Desc: Features Kowloong's legendary creature, the Azure Dragon.\n\nThe Azure Dragon is the god of the <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>east</size></color> among Kowloong's four spirit animals, who protects Kowloong on its <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>east</size></color>.

Title: White Tiger Scroll
Desc: Features Kowloong's legendary creature, the White Tiger.\n\nThe White Tiger is the god of the <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>west</size></color> among Kowloong's four spirit animals, who protects Kowloong on its <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>west</size></color>.

Title: Black Tortoise Scroll
Desc: Features Kowloong's legendary creature, the Black Tortoise.\n\nThe Black Tortoise is the god of the <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>north</size></color> among Kowloong's four spirit animals, who protects Kowloong on its <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>north</size></color>.

Title: Vermilion Bird Scroll
Desc: Features Kowloong's legendary creature, the Vermilion Bird.\n\nThe Vermilion Bird is the god of the <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>south</size></color> among Kowloong's four spirit animals, who protects Kowloong on its <color=#FFFFFF><size=35>south</size></color>.

Title: Eight-Diagram-Shaped Mirror
Desc:
The Eight-Diagram-Shaped Mirror has been regarded as a Feng Shui lucky charm throughout Kowloong's long history.

The mirror consists of trigrams

in the order of <color=#FFFFFF>E - Thunder, SE - Wind,

S - Fire, SW - Earth, W - River,

NW - Heaven, N - Water, NE - Mountain</color>.

Title: Exit Dial Lock
Desc: This dial lock at the exit is full of Kowloong's cultural elements. To open the door, rotate the elements and ensure they align correctly in their respective positions.

Title: Pottery
Desc:
A vessel made by shaping and then baking the clay.

According to research, it is one of the daily utensils of the Stone-Age Kowloong.

Mostly seen in art collections today.

Title: Drum
Desc:
Kowloong's traditional musical instrument that was originally used in

ritual dances and battles.

Now a part of Kowloong's traditional dance performance.

Title: Unnamed: Halberd Weapon
Desc:
A halberd weapon that perfectly combines the spear and the dagger-axe.

Originally used as ceremonial weapon,

later as a powerful war weapon in Kowloong.
Learn about how to leave from the smart bot.
Check the information of the cultural relics in the hall. Rotate the elements to the correct positions on the dial lock to leave.
Work with Sica to defeat Qu and Huaxu at the same time.
Hidden target found!\n<size=25>The character restores HP and Signature Energy. Deals 15% more All DMG. Gains a shield of 100% of Max HP.</size>

Title: Construct Kane's Record
Desc:
I think you were right, sister. I should've given it more thought before taking the operation to become a Construct. But at that time months ago, I only wanted an escape from the fact that I could no longer paint. I'd rather choose another path than exist as a human who couldn't hold a pen properly due to hand disability. I don't regret my choice. But... There's something I do regret. If I hadn't left out of spite, I might have gotten WGAA's approval of my application. Although it was not my intention to become a soldier, the troop I'm in is mostly made up of rookies, so we are stationing safer areas in most cases. I also have time to paint every after the shift. (I haven't finished it, but I can bring it to you when you're free next time.)
Sorry for not writing to you for a long time. I know that you've been asking people about me.
...It's my shift. I'll end it here. I promise to write more. Sorry. Miss you!
...
...
(The rest of the audio is full of noise. Maybe someone accidentally pressed the record button in battle. Some information about the battle could be restored through analysis.)

Title: Log ID: 721683461215
Desc: Regular check done. No errors found in the aircraft operating data. The meteorite impact yesterday only caused small scratches on the external gate 2. Stone fragments were cleaned during the investigation.\nThe concentration of the aerosol disinfectant in the passage to gate 2. Replenishment is required. You're suggested to use gate 1 before the replenishment arrives tomorrow.

Title: Log ID: 721683461216
Desc: Carrier signals received! Increase orbiter's height and reduce operating angular velocity!\n...\nDocked! Immediately start living resource transporting!

Title: Log ID: 721683461217
Desc: As gate 2 side port was the planned docking angle, using the gate 2 passage before the aerosol disinfectant refill is...\nOverall disinfection of gate 2 passage was immediately carried out!\nGate 2 passage's aerosol disinfectant is replenished!

Title: Log ID: 721683461218
Desc: Admin 09 is on sick leave today. Admin 26 will be on duty today.\nNo abnormalities in route.

Title: Log ID: 721683461219
Desc: Today's regular check is done! In this cycle of operation, the medicine consumption has greatly gone up. Medicine replenishment request sent to the superiors!\nThe aircraft will be on full auto mode before the supply pod arrives. Please stay in your private cabins as much as possible!

Title: Log ID: 721683461220
Desc: No response to the medicine replenishment request.\nRequested again.

Title: Log ID: 721683461221
Desc: Regular check done. Minor errors found and corrected in the aircraft operating data. Previous medicine replenishment request checked. Admin 11 failed to send the request through the correct channel. Admin 26 sent it again but didn't correct the channel. Request sent again with urgency.

Title: Log ID: 721683461222
Desc:
Still no rescue??? Hurry!!!
He's crazy!!! He's crazy too!!! They are all crazy!!!
He detached the emergency escape pod!!!
No! No! I've got to...

Title: Log ID: 721683461223
Desc:
Regular check done. No errors found in the aircraft operating data. Admin 26 lost his mind due to illness and detached the emergency escape pod. We've locked him up in his personal cabin.

Regular check done. No errors found in the aircraft operating data.
Regular check done. No errors found in the aircraft operating data.

Sorry, Granpa Hawthorne.
I shouldn't have thrown the stone at you in the afternoon or made fun of you for having to celebrate the festival alone with Nellie.
My parents told me that your uncle (scratched) son didn't return to the camp to protect everyone. What I did was wrong. That was impolite.
Mom invited Granpa Hawthorne to our tent. The atmosphere is happy in our tent.

Title: Squad Log
Desc:
Record 14

Arrived at the designated mission location and started to eliminate the enemy.
...With that said, but I'm the only one in charge of vehicle management and temporary vehicle support... I know that captain and the two seniors don't want me to risk it on the frontline because I'm new, but I want to be useful! Damn! Snipping minions once in a while in the floating car is not the ground mission I expected.
...

Record 18

The mission was carried out smoothly and was about to end. Captain and the others read my logs. They rubbed my hair and laughed a long time. Well, it seems there's no chance to make any great contribution this time...
...

Record 26

They live under the ventilation duct! The number of enemies is twice, no, three times, as we expected! Captain is injured. We have to leave immediately!
...

Record 30

They are coming from all directions. Did they deliberately hide themselves for us to reach the ventilation duct? No... They can't be this smart! It's impossible! Captain's injury seems serious... I just checked. There isn't much fuel left in the vehicle... We took a detour to break their siege. According to the plan, we should have been on our way back home at this time...

Record 31

We are now hiding between two solar panels. Everyone has run out of ammo. Guns have become clumsy cold weapons. Captain asked us to get rid of everything except medicine and fuel. Our chance to withdraw would be small if we fail to get our vehicle moving, so we have to reduce the load. Next, we are gonna rush out. Hope it will work... Damn... My hands... Just stop shaking...

Record 32

They found us. We spent a lot more fuel to get rid of them... Is there really nothing we can do this time?

Record 33

...

Captain jumped... I saw him falling into the enemies with my own eyes...

Record 34

We sniped the illumination system with the vehicle and finally reached the exit as planned. But... There are too many of them... Zod seems lost ever since we lost captain. Now Lin is in charge.

Record 35

The sun is up... but Zod is not on the vehicle...
...
Even Lin fails to force a smile as he always managed to when he tried to encourage us.

Record 36

We decided to try if we can break the doom and leave from there. But... Is this transparent doom really as fragile and breakable as the glass?

Record 37

...
Would we all have lived if captain were still here?
Would none of this have happened if I had treated the mission more seriously?
If only... I were the one who died...
Ayla has successfully moved Xm. All team gains a DMG Bonus!

Title: Arctic Route Union
Desc: An economic union formed by the trading ports around the Arctic Circle. One of the biggest four economic entities in the Golden Age.

Title: Kowloong
Desc: A regional commercial organization in the Golden Age in the coastal cities of East Asia with well developed trade and shipbuilding businesses and a Kua-Er-class armed dreadnought "Nighter". It is one of the biggest four economic entities in the world.

Title: Pulia Forest Park
Desc: A peaceful and quiet forest park. One of the famous Golden-Age human tourist spots.

Title: Bionic SO-79:
Desc:
Production Date: 210■-12-1■, Service Time: Unknown.
Recycle Log: Bionic found in ruins. Modified from Snow Owl that was originally designed for military reconnaissance purposes to be a robot pet for kids...
It's said that humans would put flowers in the muzzles to express their desire for peace...
Conflicts and meaningless behaviors, but...

Title: Bionic SH27 & 28:
Desc: Production Date: Unknown, Service Time: Unknown.\nRecycle Log: Bionics found after the huge "Tide". Their memory shells are completely broken and can't be fixed.\nAmberia... the Forest Guards... the Ascendants... And, Babylonia...

Title: Bionic PB-03:
Desc:
Production Date: 209■-07-2■, Service Time: 3■ years.
Recycle Log: Military bionic found among scrapped machines in the Arctic Route Union's abandoned Pehrm Military-Industrial Base. As a mechanoid without logic circuit capable of deep learning, it was designed solely for strategic attacks.
Order, obedience, discipline, violence, and subdual—
Was this how the Arctic Route Union achieved unification?

Title: Commandant ■■■■
Desc:
The Babylonia Task Force Commandant who played a big role in the Arctic Route Union incident.
Faced the first humanoid hybrid Construct Amberia with the human body.
"Hero of Babylonia"/Ascendant ■■'s ■■■...
Failed to analyze the detailed data of that human...
This is a replica of the combat suit that human wore during the battle in the Arctic area.

Title: Hold on before the guide recovers!
Moses-Class Icebreaker — Naval
Desc: Production Date: 210■-01-2■, Service Time: ■■\nOne of the Arctic Route Union's biggest Moses-class icebreakers. Equipped with two RPNF-310 nuclear reactors. Capacity: 80 persons. Tonnage: 35550 tons. Load: 100k tons.
Explore the hall or talk to the guide to go further into the hall.
Talk to the guide to go further into the hall.
Investigate the access control system of the hall.
Eliminate the Kurono Constructs in the hall.

Title: There's nothing useful in this pocket!
[Comms Record]
Desc: [14:56; Sword 9] Sword squad called for tech support. Data document A found in Area H. We are in the process of hacking into the security system. We request technicians for support as the core level is indecipherable.\n[14:58; Technician] Command received. Heading to the area. Have we eliminated all the mechanoids in the hall? We are short of hands. I didn't manage to get any combat Construct to come with me.\n[15:02; Sword 9] We have eliminated all the mechanoids. No need to worry about safety. According to the rules, if we can't decipher it before 16:00, we will have to give it up and destroy the evidence. We can't let the Task Force and the "Fledglings" notice our actions.

Title: [ID Card]
Desc: Sword squad's external technician 013. Advanced technician.

Title: [Cracking Device Remote Control]
Desc:
...Product Instructions: Capable of controlling the matched ground cracking device via various methods...
Feature 1: Connection to the ground cracking device. Capable of fast reading and sending all cracked content...
Feature 3: Capable of remote-controlling the cracking device to send EMP against Inver-Devices in emergent cases. The feature requires at least one person. The success rate is between 70% to 90% based on the actual elements...
*This product is only available to mid-level internal data personnel. Please keep it a secret. Otherwise, there will be severe consequences!*
Search the Kurono Construct for useful items.
Use the ID card to gain access to the control panel.

Title: Use Spooner's Support Skill to defeat the enemy!

Desc: Holoscan to look for awakened machines and enter the cleansing program.
Stand by in the hall and wait for Spooner's signal.

[15:30, System Message] Failed to send the message. Try again?

Title: Mission X1
Desc: Mission Content: Invade City ■■■■ and recycle test subject ■■■■. In case of any mechanoid who stands in the way, refer to Attachment 1 - Mechanoid Virus to control it.\nAttachment 1 - Mechanoid Virus

Title: Mission Record
Desc:
—Experiment base ■■■■ invaded by unidentified ■■■. Test subject ■■■ was lost.
—Coordinates confirmed for test subject ■■■. Special team ■■■■ dispatched to the target location to recycle it.
—Unexpected interference from ■■■. Mission delayed.
—■■ is confimed to be on the move. Backup plan ■■■■ activated.
(Record destroyed)

Title: Intel: Constellia (Old Site)
Desc:
A huge city constructed in the late Golden Age. Part of ■■■■.
The identity of the reconstructor is still unknown. Confirmed as an abnormal mechanoid.
Intel sent back to ■■■■. Waiting for further instructions.
(Record destroyed)

Title: Pulia Forest Park Hall
Desc: Life thrives in the forest with or without visitors.

Title: Pulia Forest Park Ruins
Desc: The end of the catastrophe. The light of the dawn.
Reconstruct the past through the data port.

Title: Art Museum Hall - Theater
Desc: This is the Constellia Theater. The next play is...

Title: Art Museum Hall - Forest Park

Title: Art Museum Hall - Moon Hall

Title: Art Museum Hall
Desc: Here it gathers the artistic crystallization of numerous cultures.

Title: Arctic Route Union

Title: Kowloong

Title: Pulia Forest Park

Title: Theater Hall
Desc: The gate of the hall is wide open. All the lights in the ring theater are on as if it is welcoming you quietly.

Title: Airplane Mode
Desc: <color=#FF0000>Press and hold Dodge</color> to activate the Airplane Mode.\nWith the Airplane Mode on, <color=#FF0000>tap Dodge</color> to go up and <color=#FF0000>tap again</color> to slow down and go down.\nWith the Airplane Mode on, <color=#FF0000>press and hold Dodge</color> to slow down and exit the Airplane Mode after going lower than a certain level.

Title: North Asian Research Institute of Life Science and Evolution

Desc: Find a way to unlock the entrance.
Find the terminal corresponding to the key.
Use the terminal to remove the entrance guard.
The isolation door is locked. No passing!

Title: News Archive A21654211
Desc:
Jul 13, the contract plan of human experiment on death-row prisoners has been terminated officially.
The plan approved by the World Government has been around for three years. Originally, it was a charity contract signed by the prisoner and their family voluntarily for the prisoner to assist in the medical experiment after receiving compensation.
However, this year, it was revealed that the related institutes had "borrowed" the prisoners secretly to carry out inhuman experiments in the name of the World Government without their agreement.
After that, people started a mass protest against the plan. Three days later, the plan was completely halted. Human experiments were once again listed as an illegal operation.

Title: M.I.N.D. Group Testing Record XX8798
Desc:
"Group A Bio-Brain Experiment Subject List:
■■■■, ■■■■, ■■■■, ■■■■
■■■■...
Group B Cyber-Brain Experiment Subject List:
00237-00897
33254-33278
00178-02971
Group C Bio-Cyber Brain Experiment Subject List:
AC5465
VC1120
MX3545."

Title: Lab Report 45551
Desc:
...
named this phenomenon M.I.N.D. deviation, a mismatch between individual consciousness, self-perception, and the physical body accompanied by an extremely low neural sync rate.
A significant 94.1% of subjects experienced difficulty in body control when this phenomenon occurred.
Additionally, the majority showed strong signs of agitation or depression with a destructive impulse toward themselves and others.
Despite any treatment, 48.12% retained a certain degree of memory disorder.
(Data of the latter section of this report have been damaged...)

Title: Lab Report 49012
Desc: "—\nSubjects implanted with these M.I.N.D. replicas were discovered to possess a shared cognition.\nWe named this "Homologous Consciousness", which could allow them to transmit information and emotions amongst themselves in a nearly imperceptible manner."

Title: Old Work Log 575446
Desc:
"(The work log was created before the Punishing Virus and those experiment reports...)
The regular check is done. We've picked 8 out of the 103 subjects for the next round of cultivation.
Among them, subject CB103 is closest to the target state. Whether this is related to her relationship with ■■■■ remains to be seen in further experiments.
CB107 has been confirmed dead after delivery. CB103 showed a high level of concern for the baby and requested to touch it."

Title: Old Work Log 575459
Desc: "All selected 8 subjects are dead except CB103. Please refer to the attachment for details.\nWe checked up on CB103 and found she was pregnant. Researcher ■■■■ confessed what he did.\nProfessor ■■■ believes that this is probably the reason why CB103 is still alive and proposed to let CB103 deliver before participating in the regular experiments again."

Title: Old Work Log 575518
Desc: "(The record here is incomplete...)\nIf..., CB103 will be our Cthylla and give birth to ■■■.\nThe success is around the corner..."
Stop the enemy from getting to you.
A group of mechanoids are coming.
A large number of mechanoids are coming. Fight until reinforcements arrive.

Title: North Asian Research Institute of Life Science and Evolution

Desc: Due to serious infection, both <color=#00FFFF>lost 20% ATK</color>.
With the two working in perfect tune, the character switch cooldown is <color=#FFFF00>greatly reduced</color>.
Eliminate all enemies in the way.

Title: Nanami's Secret Game
Desc: This time. it's not just a three-second tip but a simple line of game description.\nLet's finish this in one go—!\nｂ（￣▽￣）ｄ

Title: Nanami's Secret Game (Cracked Version)
Desc: Now you're the Boss. Defeat all the players all at once!\nLet's finish this in one go—!\nｂ（￣▽￣）ｄ

Title: Hiranyagarbha 11F
Desc: Defeat the enemies hiding in the deepest part.
<color=#00FFFF>Press Jump again</color> to perform a <color=#00FFFF>double jump</color>.
Use <color=#00FFFF>Red</color>/<color=#00FFFF>Blue</color> Orbs <color=#00FFFF>when dashing forward</color> to get <color=#00FFFF>enhanced</color>.
Avoid the "lasers that kill on contact" and move on!
<color=#00FFFF>Double jump</color> to move forward by stepping on the boxes.
<color=#00FFFF>Wall jump</color> to avoid the boss' skills.

Title: Game Over
Desc: Wuuu... I won't lose next time!
Protect the server from the corruption and defeat the enemies.
Get close to the <color=#00FFFF>server terminal</color> to gain bonuses.
[Starfarer] gains a Signature Extra DMG Bonus every time when she deals DMG through a Signature Move.
[Noan] gains an Extra DMG Bonus every time when dealing damage through a [3-Ping] or [Gear Level up].
Enemy is immune to Basic Attacks. Please be careful.
Investigate the scene with the Phantom Tracer.
The target location is not far away. Proceed with caution.

Title: A Dead Person
Desc: A dead person who dresses like a traveling merchant passing by.\nHer chest seems to have been torn open by something, with signs of infection on the skin around the wound.\nHer fingertips are coated with black mud. Her body is still warm. She must have passed away not long ago.

Title: A Survivor
Desc: He is still breathing, but the one next to him has already passed away.\nJudging from the amount of the liquid with Punishing Virus on his face, the man would probably lose his eyes even if he survives.

Title: A Dead Person
Desc: A dead person. He looks like a conservation area resident.\nHis legs were deeply infected with obvious traces of tissue fluid coming out.\nBlood blisters can be found on the exposed skin.

Title: Suspicious Traces
Desc: Strange traces on the ground.\nWith human tissue and Punishing Virus.\nWas there a fight?

Title: Suspicious Traces
Desc:
Strange traces on the wall.
Also with human tissue and Punishing Virus. Was the fight intense?
I didn't hear any fight at all.
...Could it be snails? Some snails seem to have moved past here.

Title: Noctis' Investigation Journal
Desc: Anyway, I questioned every person who I didn't like... who looked suspicious. Don't ask how I did it. There's a weird sheriff at the mayor's house. Would you like to catch him with me?
Ten o'clock at night, Noctis finally brought back the investigation report.

Title: Resident Dialogue Summary
Desc: A security mechanoid named "Sergeant" disconnected from the local area network last night. The sheriff is investigating it, saying that the mechanoid seems to have been abandoned somewhere.

Title: Tavern Owner's Information
Desc: I saw the sheriff with an unknown Construct last night when throwing out the garbage. I didn't think much because I was too sleepy. But looking back, I wonder why a sheriff was with an unknown Construct on the eve of the Harvest Festival...
[Data Recovery Success—ID P β-I005, standard patrol mechanoid, playing back the patrol record on April 9.]
Got the list of people on duty in Area B for the past few days and the schedule for today from the sheriff...
After the Harvest Festival starts, Noctis arrives near the mayor's house...

Title: Comms Record WH-0409
Desc: ?? (Male): I dressed up as a sheriff on patrol in Area B and destroyed the security system nearby last night. You just need to follow up according to the plan. This is the key to shutting down the security system. Don't lose it!\n??? (Female): Copy that. Tomorrow X:00 p.m. on the Harvest Festival, Team A and B will carry it out according to the plan. I'll need you to turn down the security system near the target.

Title: Private Journal: 603201
Desc:
If we could abandon those naive ideas and take another look at the previous experiments from a broader viewpoint, these are failures through and through without a doubt.

I was working in the wrong direction right from the beginning. Thankfully, I still have time. The M.I.N.D. is a deep subject. I will come up with a satisfactory answer one day.

Title: Private Journal: 604532
Desc:
The routine check is done. Among these children, 6 samples are qualified to enter the next round of cultivation. I found that their M.I.N.D.s have a higher fusion rate. Professor ■■■ thinks it is due to physical fitness, but I don't think so.

After inquiring about these children, I found that they all grew up in the same orphanage and received the same education. Does this have any impact on their "M.I.N.D."? This could give birth to a new theory...

Alisa... is the best.

Title: Private Journal: 620503
Desc:
Some Project Cthylla materials were modified. Those kids were dead, and she was also destroyed.

Who would care about these meaningless data now?

Title: M.I.N.D. Fusion Experiment Record
Desc:
Experiment ID: 802351

Sample ID: Group E, ET-005, ET-008
                  Group A, AF-002, AF-006

Experiment Record:
1. Performed M.I.N.D. fusion on two subjects who were forced to relinquish their survival instinct. Rejection rate observed: 64.4%.
2. Performed M.I.N.D. fusion on one subject who was forced to relinquish their survival instinct and one subject who willingly relinquished their survival instinct. Rejection rate observed: 48.7%.
3. Performed M.I.N.D. fusion on two subjects who both willingly relinquished their survival instinct. Rejection rate observed: 25.9%.

Conclusion:
A strong correlation was observed between the rejection rate and subjects' will to live in small-sample experiments.
Need to increase the sample size for further research.
Continued weakening of subjective will in samples is also necessary.

Title: Utopia Supplementary Lab Protocols
Desc:
1. Running around in the lab is strictly prohibited.

2. Hiding personal belongings in the lab is strictly prohibited.

3. All experiment records are confidential.

4. All lab data and materials are the property of Dr. Pickman.


...

Title: Personal File I
Desc:
Name: Cecily

Identity: Babylonia Construct, Silver Falcon Captain.

Cause: Taken in during a battle in conservation area 112.

Notes: Allergic to eggs. Please mind when preparing recipes.

Comment: Excellent Construct with a strong will and a calm mind. Stayed after realizing that escape was not possible.

She's still trying to escape, but that's fine, because it takes a strong M.I.N.D. to bear the most beautiful fruit.

Title: Personal File II
Desc:
Name: Nata

Identity: Babylonia Construct, Silver Falcon Captain.

Cause: Taken in during a battle in conservation area 112.

Notes: Likes reading and orders books to Utopia.

Comment: Trusts her captain. That's good. I believe they will be perfect partners again...

Title: Experiment Journal: 701254
Desc:
...


We tracked the previous test subject, the human being who survived with the Punishing Virus. By using a special M.I.N.D. fusion method, we fused another M.I.N.D. with the existing one when making the test subject a Construct.

No rejection reactions have been observed so far. We will continue to observe.


...

Title: Experiment Journal: 701584
Desc:
...


The test subject is currently in good condition. We've sent it to Babylonia to work on missions.

The test subject has not realized the existence of the other M.I.N.D. in the body. The main M.I.N.D. named Camu has hidden up with no obvious M.I.N.D. fluctuations detected from him.


...
There are footsteps at the door.
Boss can come back from death by drain the blood of minions.
Frame contaminated and is getting weak!
Find Cathy to complete the mission.

Title: Kuroros' Testimonies About Who Did It
Desc:
<color=#FF0000>Red Kuroro</color>: <color=#FF0000>Red Kuroro</color> didn't do it, kuku.
<color=#FFFF00>Yellow Kuroro</color>: It must be White Kuroro. He's the only one without a color, kuku.
<color=#97CBFF>Blue Kuroro</color>: <color=#FFFF00>Yellow Kuroro</color> did this, kuku!
White Kuroro: <color=#FFFF00>Yellow Kuroro</color> lied! <color=#FFFF00>Yellow Kuroro</color> framed me!

One of them lied. Who did it?

Title: 100 Photo-Taking Tips for Couples
Desc:
1. Use light to create a soft atmosphere.
2. Create sense of depth and space by using composition methods including "three-section composition" and "symmetrical composition."
3. Facial expressions. Try to keep your girl friend relaxed and natural while asking her to give you the expressions you want. Chat with her to ease her tension.
4. Pay attention to the background. A simple background can make your subject stand out. You can use the background to create the atmosphere you want.

...

Title: Russ' Mother: Kelly

Title: Forgotten Access Card
Desc: An access card hidden in the corner. No one knows why it's there.\nDid someone hide it here?

Title: Sewer - The Abandoned "Construct"
Desc:
No obvious marks of identity, no scratches, no big wounds.
There is blood and vital fluid on the ground at the same time...

What happened here?

Title: Sewer - Deep Down
Desc: These bodies seems to have been here for a long time with vital fluid drained out and full of dust.\nMost of them doesn't have any signs of Punishing Virus infection.

Title: Lab - Body
Desc: This one doesn't seem to be a complete Construct. The modification is likely to have been interrupted for some reason.

Title: Lab - Operating Table
Desc:
An unpleasant smell of dust, blood, and vital fluid comes out.
Why did they clean this place up if the researchers were escaping from a mine disaster like the report says?

What were they trying to cover up?

Title: A Page Torn off From Some Diary
Desc:
My friend at the mine went missing.
They all said he must have died in the collapse accident.

I don't believe it.
I wanna go find him.

Title: Material Usage Records
Desc:
I heard it's hard to get "materials" out there.
Now we are running out of them,
so they started to catch miners who found it out down there to make it up.
But...

Hey, who cares about them?

Title: Research Record - A-00-0000
Desc: Due to the NDA,\nwe are not allowed to note down the detailed lab progress of the Tantalum copolymer,\nbut we will explain our great experiment in chronological order.

Title: Research Record - A-01-0121
Desc:
We have gotten the preliminary form of Tantalum copolymer and started to carry out experiments on materials.
Unfortunately, some of them failed to adjust to the copolymer. Our researchers decided to start tests to find out the best copolymer proportion.

...

Title: A Broken Paper Note
Desc:
Rescuer... I heard the sound of a rescuer. From the town... It's Zoe! Zoe is here!
We are saved—



(The long em dash has torn the paper.)

Title: Body Lying in the Corner
Desc: A body lying in the corner that doesn't look like a researcher.\nHis legs were carefully patched up. The bandages have a rescuer's mark that Bridget is very familiar with.

Title: Support Force Rescue Guidelines
Desc: During a rescue mission, always save people with high survival probabilities first. Make sacrifices where needed.

Title: Frame Combat Techniques
Desc: Frames of this Support Force are extremely good at defense. It's necessary to dodge their attacks.

Title: Support Force Tracking Techniques
Desc: Frames of the Support Force usually come with a scan system. Open the scan system to better observe the details in the environment.
Go to the Central Control Room
Connect to the control panel circuit
Boosted by sorcery, the attacks grow more devastating!
Defying death and bending fate is what I do!
The distant creaking of a gate echoed through the air...

Title: [Log 1]
Desc: [Record 1] Heh, excellent. The machine parts are taking over more and more... This way, I'll have greater control over this body. There's still a ton of data to record from the replication experiment, but even if that human woke up, they wouldn't be able to decipher a single word of this mechanoid-speak. [Record 2] Hahaha! Found it. The one prophesied to pass the higher-dimensional filter. Gestalt's predictions were right on the money. With this frame's data, I'll have the power to shatter humanity! [Record 3] Just the ■■■■ data isn't enough to recreate the [Hyperreal] filter process. There must be another piece to Gestalt's predictions. [At the end of despair, grant the universe equal compassion. In every future, humanity's door awaits...] Yeah, that's it. There has to be more info somewhere... (I'm pretty sure there's a second part to this log...)

Title: [Log 2]
Desc: (I'm pretty sure there's a first part to this log...) [Record 4] Damn it... All these shards are redundant, but it's enough. I'll use these scraps to replicate the [Hyperreal] data. [Record 5] Dimitri's been hogging those high-powered radio waves lately... Hmph, still collecting humans. I need to keep a closer eye on him. If necessary...

Title: [Gold Data]
Desc: From up there, we can see every ocean current, every mountain range, every forest and field. We can even make out the outlines of big cities. You really should see the night side—it's breathtaking. Pearls scattered across the terminator line, those city lights—they seem to be breathing, blinking, smiling, then fading into the darkness. Those lucky enough to have been to space never get tired of saying, "Our Earth, she's a masterpiece!"\n—Alexei Leonov, cosmonaut and painter of the Newtonian era, the first human to walk in space.

Title: [Supply Shipment List]
Desc: Venison... 10 crates —————————— Titanium ore (to be refined)... 10 crates Rare earth minerals... 5 crates Steel rebar bundles... 10 ■Silicon■■... ■■ (Remainder covered in blood, illegible)
Tap Attack and dodge according to the rhythm of the bullets.\nRed bullets: attack. Blue bullets: dodge.
Trigger Ultima Slash to obtain Signal Orbs!

Title: Scribbled Drawings
Desc: Messy brush strokes and pages full of smudges reveal the mental state of the "creator". Reading on, a fairy tale written in childlike sentences can be found. It seems strangely familiar.\n\nSeveral pages of the story are missing, their whereabouts unknown.

Title: Intact Oil Pastel
Desc: A faintly inscribed name can be found on its side. The scribbled drawings were likely created using this very tool.\n\nThe boundless imagination of children found an outlet through this medium, bringing them rare moments of relief and joy.

Title: Broken Oil Pastel
Desc: Though broken in half, this oil pastel was frugally used and never discarded. After all, art supplies are treasures that many children of this era cannot afford to own.\n\nFood and rest were necessities for the children, while the more precious things, such as care and compassion, remained concepts beyond their comprehension, let alone whether they were "worthy" of them.

Title: Peculiar Oil Pastel
Desc: This particular oil pastel appears identical to the previous two. Upon closer inspection, a metal spike can be found embedded within. It was likely the result of a child's mischief, as no ordinary child should be a able to wield such an object to cause harm.\n\n"Sins are concealed with grass, needles and guns adorned with flowers."

Title: Dust-Covered Teddy Bear
Desc: Its surface is marked by the passage of time, yet traces remain of the care it once received. A neatly tied bow can be found around its neck, and stains of blood have marred its fur.\n\nThe teddy bear still waits for its owner. Perhaps it knows that it was not abandoned on purpose.

Title: Broken Construct Remains
Desc: A frail body is imprisoned here, undecaying, unable to find release even in death. Its remains endured, aging and fracturing, gazing at intruders with its broken presence.\n\nSuch is the fate of the children who couldn't escape.

Title: Shorthalt's Candy
Desc: A candy. Go ahead, pick it up. It won't explode; it will sing you a song: "Happy birthday to you → Happy birthday to you ↗ Happy birthday to you ↘ Happy birthday to you ↓"\n\nThe electronic components hidden within carry another message: "End it all. End me."

Title: Restraint Strap Buckle
Desc: Tighten the buckle of a restraint strap, and it can secure a dangerous test subject. Yet, this particular buckle stands out. It has been sharpened, just like the metal spike hidden within the oil pastel.\n\n"Truth is a blade ground from restraints, an elephant devoured by ants."

Title: Researcher's Name Tag
Desc: A name tag engraved with "056", marked by severe wear and tear. What happened to its owner remains a mystery, but the name tag bears signs of being violently torn away.\n\nDonning this cold piece of metal, she could shed yet another slice of her conscience.

Title: "Class Schedule"
Desc: "S0143", "S0145"... The crossed-out numbers represent the students of this place. The course content remains unknown, but the rigor of the assessments is evident. Three failures likely resulted in expulsion.\n\nThe test subjects' identifiers were standardized. They were not meant to have names of their own.
Now's not the time to sleep.

Title: Lost Page I
Desc:
In the countryside far away from the city, there lived a family. A husband and wife had two children: a boy named Eamon and a girl named Glaea.
Even in the glorious Golden Age, the family was so poor that they often had no food to eat. After the outbreak of Punishing, they could barely afford two meals a day.
One day, the father lay in bed and asked his wife: "If we can't even feed ourselves, what do we do with the children?"
After talking, the couple made a plan: they would take the children to the edge of the city, give them a pack of hardtacks, and leave them there. This way, the couple could free themselves of the burden.
They had hesitations. If the children were left on their own, they would soon be torn apart by the Corrupted. But to save themselves, they made up their minds.
The children couldn't sleep because they were too hungry, and they heard every word their parents said.
Glaea cried sadly and whispered to her brother: "Eamon, we're going to die."
Eamon said: "Don't worry. I know what to do."
Once their parents fell asleep, Eamon quietly got up and sneaked outside. The moonlight was bright that night, illuminating piles of pebbles in front of their home. He filled his pockets with as many pebbles as he could.
Then he returned to their room. "Now sleep," he told his sister: "we won't be abandoned."

Title: Lost Page II
Desc:
The next day, before sunrise, the mother came into the children's room to wake them: "Get up, you lazybones! Today we're going to the city for supplies."
On the way to the city, Eamon kept stopping to look back. After a few times, the father couldn't help but ask: "What are you looking for? Hurry up and keep walking."
"Dad," Eamon replied: "I'm looking for my kitty. We didn't say goodbye to it."
But Eamon wasn't looking at the cat. Instead, he was dropping pebbles from his pocket along the way.
When they reached the edge of the city, the father said: "Listen, we're going to look for supplies. You two stay here. I'll light a fire to keep you warm, so you won't get cold."
The children sat by the fire, listening to the sound of their parents rummaging, which made them feel safe. In reality, however, the noise was made by a Corrupted dismantling a person who happened to pass by.
The siblings waited and waited. Finally, they fell asleep. Their parents never returned. When they woke up, Glaea cried with fear: "How will we get out of the city?"
"We'll wait for the moon to come out," Eamon comforted her: "When the moonlight falls, we'll find our way home."
As he spoke, the full moon rose, its light illuminating the pebbles Eamon had scattered along the way. Hand in hand, the siblings followed the moonlit trail and reached home before dawn.

Title: Lost Page III
Desc:
Not long after, all the nearby cities were taken over by the Corrupted, and fights over supplies became worse.
One night, Eamon and Glaea overheard their parents talking again: "Bad news. We only have a little food left. We can't starve to death! This time, we must take the children deeper into the city, so they'll never find their way back."
Once again, the children were awake and heard every word. That night, Eamon got up to collect pebbles. However, this time, he found that his parents had locked the door in advance. Even so, Eamon comforted his sister: "Don't worry, Glaea. Now sleep. We won't be abandoned."
The next morning, just like before, the mother gave each of them a piece of hardtack. On the way to the city, Eamon broke his hardtack into small pieces and dropped them along the way.
Once again, the father couldn't help but ask: "What are you looking for this time?"
"Dad," Eamon replied: "I'm looking for Glaea's little parrot. We didn't say goodbye to it."
Again, their parents went off to "gather supplies", leaving the siblings deep in the city. When they woke up and tried to follow the moonlight and the trail of hardtack crumbs, they found the ground completely clean. There were no crumbs. Birds had eaten them all.
"Don't be scared. We'll find a way." Eamon said.
They walked for an entire day, but no matter where they went, they couldn't find their way home. They were about to starve to death. They could only find a bit of damp puffed food in a trash can.
Eventually, they collapsed by the roadside and fell asleep.

Title: Lost Page IV
Desc:
When they woke up again, they saw Glaea's parrot. It stood on a branch, its voice as melodic as music. Instinctively, Eamon and Glaea followed the parrot, until they reached a beautiful house.
The house was painted with cartoon drawings. There were more children like them playing at the door, and the smell of food came out through the windows.
"This is great!" The siblings ran to the house excitedly. They were invited by the children and had a warm meal. As Glaea was eating a piece of chicken, a gentle voice spoke behind them: "Who's stealing lunch from our Bright Welfare Home?"
An old lady with a cane appeared with a few caretakers. Eamon and Glaea were scared. They nearly dropped the food in their mouths.
But the old lady didn't scold them. Instead, she said with a smile: "Welcome. From now on, the Bright Welfare Home is your home. Have a good rest in your room. We have warm beds for you."
She took the siblings by the hand and led them to a room. Eamon and Glaea lay on the bed and felt like everything was a dream.

Title: Lost Page V
Desc:
But there's no such thing as a free lunch! In reality, the old lady was only pretending to be kind. She was a cruel trafficker. She had established the orphanage because she made a deal with a nearby research institute.
She would take in children, feed them well, and examine their condition. Those in good health would be sold to the institute for four tubes of Immune Serum.
Her eyesight was poor, and she couldn't see things far away. However, the orphanage's surveillance system was very sensitive. It could alert her the moment anyone approached.
"These two are mine now. They'll never escape."
The next day, before the children woke up, the old lady came to their room. Seeing them cuddling together, she said to herself happily: "Good, good."
Suddenly, a caretaker grabbed Eamon and dragged him into the basement, locking him in a cage. Eamon cried for help, but no one could hear him. He realized that the children who had been playing yesterday were all gone.
After dealing with Eamon, the old lady woke Glaea and forced her to clean the orphanage before letting her play in the yard. "Hurry up, or I'll send your brother away right now!"
Glaea was terrified, but she could do nothing but follow her orders.
Every day, Eamon ate hearty meals, while Glaea could only eat his leftovers. Every once in a while, the old lady would ask Eamon to stick his hand through the cage bars: "Let me see if you're still so thin and weak."

Title: Lost Page VI
Desc:
Eamon was clever. He knew the old lady had poor eyesight, so he always stuck a chicken bone through the cage bars. Every time, she grumbled as she left, wondering why the boy never seemed to gain weight. She couldn't sell children with poor physical condition!
A month passed, and Eamon still hadn't gained weight. The old lady grew impatient. She forged his health report and determined to send him away.
When she came to Eamon's cage, he said: "I have gained weight now! But my hands can't fit through the bars. You have to let me out to check."
The old lady unlocked the cage. Instantly, Eamon shoved her hard, and Glaea pushed the old lady into the cage and locked her inside.
The old lady shrieked furiously, and heavy footsteps thundered from upstairs. It was the caretakers. Eamon pushed Glaea into a hidden passage and said: "Run! Run as fast as you can!"
"But what about you, brother?" Glaea cried. Then she heard a familiar answer: "Don't be scared. We'll see each other again!" Eamon said.

Glaea ran out of the Bright Welfare Home without stopping. Her parrot found her and guided her down a safe path. | From that day on, Glaea never saw Eamon again.

A lusterless teddy bear... next to a small, mangled body.
Childhood innocence and dreams, abandoned and scattered.
"Perhaps when every tear is shed and every drop of blood is drained, the pain will end."
These branches, sprouting out of nowhere, appear to be entirely formed from Punishing.

Orange Juice

Best Before: See bottom of bottle

Expires on: 2066/3/4

Title: A Dose of Serum
Desc: A dose of serum that has long expired but seemed to have been used recently.

Title: Bloodstained Nameplate
Desc: A bloodstained nameplate with Hippocrates' name...\n\nWas she also on the ground to support?

Title: A Mercenary's Journal
Desc:
<size=22>It's 6 a.m. on December 27th, 2160. I didn't sleep last night.
I've been trapped in this damn place for 7 days. The terminal still has no signal. And the electricity went off this morning.
The instant noodles and cookies in the vending machine are gonna run out and I'm gonna die someday.
The only family member I have is grandma. Now I can't go back. I wonder what she would think... When I was little, grandma often told me I was lucky to be born in a good era. She was born in one of the most affected areas during the war.
... I didn't think so. Science geniuses, politicians, and entrepreneurs are blessed, but what can I do? My own job, just like all the other working machines?
I'm a nobody. A good time is not enough to turn me into some genius or celebrity and put me on an aircraft bound for the galaxy, or make me drop the idea of playing games after work and study hard to become some great scientist. Moreover, it takes more than working hard to achieve these... It's the same with mom. She wouldn't stay with her family and give up pursuing "her ideal life" just because it's a good time.
But now, I finally understand the feeling grandma said, the feeling of having nothing to eat for days, and how important a good time and the subsistence allowances given to the poor are. I promise I will take a new look at my life if I get to survive this.
So, can I survive this? When I lost sleep, I kept thinking about what I could do to survive and help others.
But I was so starved and sleepy that my mind was full of bad ideas, making it hard to concentrate. I feel wired and uptight. I only want to scream when someone says something to me.
I need to rest, but how could I manage that on this cold floor? I need a good meal to think properly about what to do next, but where can I get that?
...
I see grass in the flower bed.</size>

Title: A Staff Member's Journal
Desc: Man, to access that special intermediate floor for decoration, every one of us has to get a unique passcode with the ID Card and enter that code again in the elevator to make it stop at that floor. Do they have to make it so hard?

The Gray Raven Commandant had a long, strange dream,


witnessing Lucia's endless sacrifices and losses within.

Please close your eyes, and look away from her.\nAs long as you don't watch, her battle in the dream lasts but a moment.\nAs long as you don't watch, her suffering cannot seep from dreams into reality.

Wake up, and don't watch as time tears her apart.


Wake up, and let this torment end, even if only in dreams.


Don't look at her anymore.


Please... don't look at her anymore...
Talk to Lucia and decide what to do next.
Go to the underground parking with Lucia.
Go to the underground parking. (Optional: Talk to Lucia.)
Go to the target area and head to the crack.
